name: Link Jewels - Draw Pipe Lines
description:
100% FREE! DOWNLOAD NOW and start having fun!
Play the classic line-drawing game known as "Flow" or "NumberLink" with beautiful picture jewels!
Endless variety with more than 450 beautiful "Emoji" images for you to match, and 150,000 levels included!

Take your time finding the right path to connect the jewels - there's no timer to worry about!

• Beautiful graphics!
• Intuitive touch controls!
• No timer, so you can take your time and relax...

• 150,000 levels for an endless challenge!
• 10 board sizes - 5x5 up to 9x9 for iPhone or iPad, 10x10 up to 14x14 recommended for iPad only

• 3 difficulty levels for each board size - Easy, Medium, or Hard
• Harder difficulties have less jewels on the board to connect, which makes the paths long and twisty and challenging!

• Made a wrong move? Use the Undo button to rewind and try again!
• Hints are available if you get stuck!

• Your progress is automatically saved, all the time, so go ahead and take that call or jump out to any other apps - you can come back and pick up playing right where you left off!

• Compete against your friends and against everyone worldwide for the highest scores on Game Center!

• Sounds can be disabled if you want a quiet game
• You can even listen to your own music while you play

Thanks for playing!
Come see us at http://boyhowdytechnology.com
